releaseNotes: This update includes bug fixes and improvements to enhance your experience with our App.
description:
Crypto.com is trusted by 150 million+ users worldwide. Trade safely with industry-leading compliance and security certifications today. 

Crypto Trading — Trade BTC, ETH, CRO, SOL, XRP, ADA and 400+ other cryptoassets
• Buy and sell popular crypto using fiat currencies or credit/debit cards.
• Set up recurring crypto purchases daily, weekly, or monthly with friendly trading tools. 

Ready to take your wealth to the next level?

Introducing the revamped Level Up, featuring zero trading fees* and subscriptions starting at £4.99/month.

Plus, get benefits across Crypto and Cash Yield.**

Key Changes:

Better Benefits: Enjoy Zero trading fees* and enhanced benefits across Crypto and Cards
More Accessible: Subscription plans are now available from £4.99/month
Simplified Structure: Colour tiers have been streamlined to Plus, Pro, and Private plans

* Other transaction fees and spread may still apply.
**Availability and terms subject to legal terms and jurisdiction restrictions. See the Crypto.com website for your region to learn more.

Crypto.com Card — Up to 5% back in CRO on all spend
• Spend or withdraw your funds with your Crypto.com Card anywhere Visa/ Mastercard is accepted.
• Music, movie, and shopping subscription rebates*** with selected cards.
• Access to 1,000+ airport lounges with selected cards.

Crypto Earn 
• Earn up to double digits reward rate on your crypto holdings.
• Enjoy flexible terms on over 40 crypto-assets.

Missions
• Complete Missions to earn Diamonds to redeem Mystery Boxes for rewards.

Crypto.com Pay 
• Pay with 30+ crypto, including BTC, ETH, CRO, and DOGE, and earn rewards.
• Instant settlements with zero gas fees.
• Shop at 200+ top brands and get up to 10% back in CRO.

***These offers are launched by Crypto.com independently. There is no partnership between Crypto.com and the merchants in these offers. Crypto.com has the sole discretion to modify these offers.
****Subject to terms and conditions and other limitations.


The availability of the products and services on the Crypto.com App and any given features of such products or services is subject to jurisdictional limitations and the applicable terms and conditions. Crypto.com may not offer certain products, features and/or services on the Crypto.com App in certain jurisdictions due to potential or actual regulatory restrictions.

In jurisdictions where a local licence is required, the products and services will be provided by different Crypto.com group entities in accordance with local regulatory requirements. For details of Crypto.com's licences, please refer to https://crypto.com/licenses.

For UK customers: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more: https://crypto.com/document/risk_summary_uk
